Package io.github.annabeths.GeneralControl

Class SaveManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.annabeths.GeneralControl.SaveManager
  • public abstract class SaveManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the saving and loading of save files. Save files persist between sessions.
    Since:
    Assessment 2

        pUps - A Map of PowerUpType to Integer describing how much of each powerup the player has collected.

                             GameController gc)
        Save the locations of mines to a file.
        Parameters:
        pref - A libgdx preferences object
        gc - Reference to the GameController instance of this game

      • loadMines

        public static void loadMines​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> mines,
                             GameController gc)
        Load mines from save file. Recreate mines by loading positions and instantiating new mines at this position.
        Parameters:
        mines - A map of strings of from String to String, where the value String is of form "(x,y)", where x is the x-position of the mine and y is the y-position of the mine.
        gc - Reference to the GameController instance of this game

                                GameController gc)
        Save colleges to save file.
        Parameters:
        pref - A libgdx preferences object
        gc - Reference to the GameController instance of this game

      • loadColleges

        public static void loadColleges​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> cols,
                                GameController gc)
        Load colleges from a save file
        Parameters:
        cols - A map of strings of from String to String, where the value contains the information needed to recreate the college from scratch.
        gc - an instance of GameController.

      • loadPlayerBoat

        public static void loadPlayerBoat​(java.lang.String s,
                                  GameController gc)
        Load state of a PlayerBoat from a file and set the game's PlayerBoat's stats equal to that state.
        Parameters:
        s - the state of the PlayerBoat
        gc - an instance of GameController

      • saveEntities

        public static void saveEntities​(com.badlogic.gdx.Preferences pref,
                                java.util.List<PhysicsObject> physicsObjects)
        Save entities to a file
        Parameters:
        pref - A libgdx Preferences object
        physicsObjects - GameController.physicsObjects

      • save

        public static void save​(java.lang.String saveFileName,
                        GameController gc)
        Save the game state to the given file name. In reality multiple files are created to store different aspects of the game, but all files are prefixed by saveFileName. Saving, loading and storage of files is handled by libgdx's preference system. See https://libgdx.com/wiki/preferences for more details.
        Parameters:
        saveFileName - string referring to the fileName
        gc - Reference to the GameController instance of this game

      • loadPref

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> loadPref​(com.badlogic.gdx.Preferences pref)
        Preferences.get() returns Hashmap String, ? so we need to cast it safely to Hashmap String,String, this method does so.
        Parameters:
        pref - a libgdx Preferences object
        Returns:
        Hashmap String,String contained in the Preferences object.

      • load

        public static void load​(java.lang.String saveFileName,
                        GameController gc)
        Load the game state for the given file name. In reality multiple files are created to store different aspects of the game, but all files are prefixed by saveFileName. Saving, loading and storage of files is handled by libgdx's preference system. See https://libgdx.com/wiki/preferences for more details.
        Parameters:
        saveFileName - string referring to the fileName
        gc - GameController

      • doesSaveFileExist

        public static boolean doesSaveFileExist​(java.lang.String saveFileName)
        Returns whether a given save file exists for the saveFileName, or not.
        Parameters:
        saveFileName - string referring to the fileName
        Returns:
        boolean, true if exists, false otherwise
